commands.title: MVBasic: Connect to MultiValue REST FS
MVBasic: Compile Basic Program with Debug

MVBasic.gatewayDebug.description: When set to true the MvonGateway will write a log 'gateway.log' to C:\Temp.

MVBasic.margin.description: The number of characters to use as a margin when formatting.

MVBasic.customWords.description: List of custom words to highlight in a specific color. e.g. (HELLO|WORLD)

MVBasic.customWordColor.description: The color to use when highlighting the custom words.

MVBasic.customWordPath.description: Path to a file that contains key value pairs for custom words

MVBasic.indent.description: The number of characters to use when indenting code blocks.

MVBasic.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

MVBasic.formattingEnabled.description: Set to true to enable automatic code formatting on filesave.

MVBasic.RemoteHost.description: The host name of the server.

MVBasic.UserName.description: The user name to use to login to the server.

MVBasic.encoding.description: The encoding type to use when connecting to the server.

MVBasic.ignoreGotoScope.description: The linter will not highlight goto that jump into the middle of loops.

MVBasic.Password.description: The password to use to login to the server.

MVBasic.AccountPassword.description: The password to use to use for D3/mvBase Logto.

MVBasic.HomePath.description: The home path for Unidata on server. This is only required for Unidata.

MVBasic.Account.description: The Account Name or path on the Server.

MVBasic.AccountPath.description: The path the Unidata Account. This is only used for Unidata.

MVBasic.ServerName.description: The name of the AccuTerm FTSERVER session which handles the MVRest connection.

MVBasic.RemoteDebug.description: Set to true when connecting to a Remote MVON# Host.

MVBasic.EditFiles.description: Files that should be opened in the editor.

MVBasic.GatewayType.description: The type of host the gateway is connecting to. QM, D3, Universe, Unidata,jBASE or mvBase.

MVBasic.UseRestFS.description: Use the RestFS file system for accessing the MultiValue server.

MVBasic.RestPath.description: The URL when connecting via the RestFS file system.

MVBasic.RestFS.AutoConnect.description: Automatically connect to the RestFS server without requiring a Connect command.

MVBasic.RestFS.CaseSensitive.description: The RestFS file system is case sensitive.

MVBasic.RestFS.MaxItems.description: The maximum number of items the RestFS file system can return when reading a directory.

MVBasic.RestFS.SelAttr.description: A bitmask of RestFSAttr which limits the items are returned when reading a directory. Default is: folder, file, symlink and data-only.

MVBasic.RestFS.RestAPI.description: The RestFS API version to use. 0 for original MVON# REST gateway, 1 for new gateway, mvConnect, AccuTerm connector.

MVBasic.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the language server.

MVBasic.languageType.description: The flavor of PICK you are programming against, i.e. MVON, D3, jBASE.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
